game.name: Wanted Shadows: Unchained
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 지하 세계를 장악하려는 밤의 피조물들을 물리치는 서바이버라이크 게임입니다. 침략을 물리치고, 자신만의 빌드를 완성하여 연옥의 지배자가 되십시오.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A survivors-like game where you defeat creatures of the night trying to take over the underworld. Vanquish the invasion, perfect your build, and become purgatory's master.
